description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4khlc","text":"Here states the detailed procedure to prepare brain samples for MUSIC study.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"ce439","text":"DISCLAIMER – FOR INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY; USE AT YOUR OWN RISK","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1hcak","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"iujj","text":"The protocols.io team notes that research involving animals and humans must be conducted according to internationally-accepted standards and should always have prior approval from an Institutional Ethics Committee or Board.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"CFD0977BE5C611EEB26B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}

groups.title: Human BioMolecular Atlas Program (HuBMAP) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9irl1","text":"Cut a portion of post-mortem human brain frontal cortex sample on dry ice with heavy razor blades, and collect 50 mg of the sample in a 1.5 mL LoBind tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"lrdo","text":"Use Chromium Nuclei Isolation kit (10X genomics, 1000494) to isolate nuclei from crosslinked cortex samples. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9j5g8","text":"Transfer 50 mg frozen tissue into pre-chilled sample dissociation tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5a46","text":"Add 400 μL of Lysis Buffer to Sample Dissociation Tube. Dissociate tissue with plastic pestle until homogeneous. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7cba","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asehs","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2qao","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_5":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["149",100],"data":[["Component","Volume (µL)"],["Lysis Reagent","1000"],["Reducing Agent B","1"],["Sufactant A","10"],["Total Volume ","1011"]],"guid":"DA37D9A99FDA4E6A9A399CE37E36FBD2","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":12,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"bl4mg","text":"Lysis Buffer","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Component","Volume (µL)"],["Lysis Reagent","1000"],["Reducing Agent B","1"],["Sufactant A","10"],["Total Volume ","1011"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7vli1","text":"Equally load the solution into two nuclei isolation column, and centrifuge the tubes at 16,000 x g for 20 sec at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hvos","text":"Vortex the flowthrough in the collection tube that contains nuclei for 10 sec at 3,200 rpm or max speed to resuspend nuclei. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"anmg4","text":"Centrifuge the collection tubes for 3 min at 500 x g at 4°C to pellet nuclei. Carefully discard the supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cosnb","text":"Thaw the 50 mg of brain sample on ice, and chop the tissue into smaller pieces by pestle. Store the rest of the sample at -80°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e0sb0","text":"Incubate the sample with 10 mL of 2 mM disuccinimidyl glutarate (DSG) in 1X PBS in a 15 mL LoBind tube at room temperature for 45 min with gentle rotation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7f2s9","text":"Wash once with 10 mL of 1X PBS by centrifugation at 1,000 x g for 4 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"68p7f","text":"Resuspend the sample in 15 mL of 1X PBS containing 3% formaldehyde, and incubate for 10 min with a gentle rotation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bfes3","text":"Quench the crosslinking reaction by the addition of 5 mL of 1.25 M glycine followed by an incubation of 5 min with a rotation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"n3mm","text":"Centrifuge the sample at 1,000 x g for 4 min, and wash the sample twice with ice-cold 1X PBS containing 0.3% BSA (wt/vol).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2fohk","text":"Add 600 µL of lysis buffer into the tube, and mix 10 times by pipetting. Incubate on ice for 10 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ebvo","text":"Resuspend the nuclei in 500 µL of Debris Removal Buffer provided by the kit by pipetting 15 times. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"470t5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqomh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fhutm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_4":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["196",100],"data":[["Component","Volume (µL)"],["Debris Removal Reagent","500"],["Reducing Agent B","0.5"],["Total Volume ","500.5"]],"guid":"B9304F3BBB474296895259C6DCE51BA6","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":21,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"kjsf","text":"Debris Removal Buffer","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Component","Volume (µL)"],["Debris Removal Reagent","500"],["Reducing Agent B","0.5"],["Total Volume ","500.5"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f755k","text":"Centrifuge the nuclei at 700 x g for 10 min at 4°C. Carefully discard the supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6at5v","text":"Resuspend the nuclei in 1 mL of Wash and Resuspension Buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8sdhk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfjh1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ei6hk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_5":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["166",100],"data":[["Component","Volume (µL)"],["1X PBS","1750"],["10% BSA","200"],["RNase Inhibitor (40X)","50"],["Total Volume ","2000"]],"guid":"F6EA05E94C2549CA8A9DF99ACDF57EFC","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":28,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"dfmn","text":"Wash and Resuspension Buffer","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Component","Volume (µL)"],["1X PBS","1750"],["10% BSA","200"],["RNase Inhibitor (40X)","50"],["Total Volume ","2000"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"52ps2","text":"Centrifuge the nuclei at 500 x g for 5 min at 4°C. Carefully discard the supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5n4u1","text":"Resuspend the nuclei again in 1 mL of Wash and Resuspension Buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"clf1n","text":"Centrifuge the nuclei at 500 x g for 5 min at 4°C. Carefully discard the supernatant as much as possible. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkjs8","text":"The nuclei are subjected to nuclei counting and the following procedures.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Protocol for Preparing Brain Samples for MUSIC
